Container.Name: JRE8-AMP
Container.Overview: AMP is an Application Management Panel from CubeCoders[br][br] [b]/ampdata[/b] is where amp store it's configuration files.[br][br] [b]Setup:[/b][br] Add your licenece key in the Environment Variable "LICENCE" (Advanced View)[br] If you want, you can change the module from ADS, to something else by editing the Environment Variable "MODULE" from "ADS" to another module.[br] If you start other instances in the docker (minecraft server for example), remember to add the port to the port mappings section.[br][br] Thanks to othrayte for creating the docker!
